# Crunchy Snow (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, Frostfell

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** One 20-ft.-by-20-ft. square of snow/level

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 92

An area of fallen snow designated by you becomes hard and crumbly, generating a loud crunch when stepped upon. Creatures take a â€“20 penalty on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks when traveling through crunchy snow.
